title: Coach looking for a Team to help.
body: Hello my name is ISGC i am LoL player. I have played since start of season 3 and i have a lot of expirience even if i dont have a high rank. I wish to help Ranked Teams withing playing/mechanics on champions. If you would like me to coach/help your team add me on League : ISGC : i will be happy to help ;D
